title: What's wrong with you, RIot?
body: I was playing the game then I suddenly disconnect the game, and wifi is working, so that must be the game's problem, I dc then after few minutes  I can connect back game, but we lose the game, then other people report me, and Riot, you just give me a leavebuster, It's super unfair.

replies.body: IT happened to me as well, wtf is going on
